name: Juan Pablo Lorenzo
bio: Elixir was my first step in functional programming and since I started I am very surprised with this language, its community and the incredible capabilities that Elixir has to improve software development.

name: Júlio Leitão
bio: Enjoying the Functional Programming paradigm to solve problems and build solutions with quality, maintainability, and great code design. Elixir is one of the best options on the FP world.

name: Dino
bio:
After some time working professionally with Python I got the chance to finally build something with Elixir that now runs in a production environment. 
I've always been passionate about functional programming because I feel it is more closely related to Mathematics and Elixir has enabled me to rediscover Functional Programming using awesome syntax.

name: João Thallis
bio:
Elixir is my favorite language for its simplicity and power. I've written Elixir professionally, and also use it for open source projects. 
I like Neovim, testing, Linux and automate and experiment things
